thread.title: WA Labor calls for royalties inquiry
thread.title_full: WA Labor calls for royalties inquiry

title: WA Labor calls for royalties inquiry
text:
Sun, Aug 30, 2015, 8:06 PM NZST - New Zealand Markets closed WA Labor calls for royalties inquiry AAP – 1 hour 38 minutes ago Recommend Print 
Labor is calling on the Western Australian government to hold a parliamentary inquiry into the royalty payments of major resource projects. 
Maritime Union of Australian branch secretary Christy Cain said current royalty payments to state and federal governments lacked transparency and that proper scrutiny was required. 
Mr Cain said companies such as Chevron needed to be held accountable and pay their fair share. @YahooNZBusiness on Twitter, become a fan on Facebook AAP 
Finance Minster Mathias Cormann insists that the Abbott government's plan for jobs and growth is working.
